name: nog-fso-mini-registry
description: A simple Nogfsoregd read model to resolve repo IDs and paths

scripts.test-watch: echo >&2 'nog-fso-mini-registry has no unit tests.' && exit 0 && cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)"/web/apps/packages-testapp && npm run test-packages-watch-nog-fso-mini-registry
scripts.test-headless: echo >&2 'nog-fso-mini-registry has no unit tests.' && exit 0 && cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)"/web/apps/packages-testapp && npm run test-packages-headless-nog-fso-mini-registry

author: Steffen Prohaska <prohaska@zib.de>
//: See toplevel package.json for ESLint dependencies
